item.title: 为什么白银价格比黄金价格上涨得更快
item.description: 由于俄罗斯的乌克兰战争和美国特朗普政府非正统的经济政策，投资者和各国央行纷纷寻求避险资产，黄金在今年上演了戏剧性的反弹。但现在，白银正在成为焦点。【原文：Gold has staged a dramatic rally this year as Russia’s war in Ukraine and the US Trump administration’s unorthodox economic policies sent investors and central banks reaching for safe-haven assets. Right now, however, it’s silver that’s stealing the spotlight.】

item.title: 新加坡企业承诺向马来西亚柔佛生态区投资 42 亿美元
item.description: 新加坡副总理甘金勇表示，自去年 1 月以来，新加坡公司已承诺在马来西亚柔佛州的联合经济特区投资 55 亿新元（42.3 亿美元）。【原文：Singapore companies have committed to invest S$5.5 billion ($4.23 billion) in a joint special economic zone in Malaysia’s Johor state since January last year, Singapore Deputy Prime Minister Gan Kim Yong said.】

item.title: 需求保持稳定，阿尔达尔（Aldar）从亚斯项目中获利 3.54 亿美元
item.description: 阿布扎比最大的房地产开发商阿尔达地产公司（Aldar Properties PJSC）在外国买家需求的推动下，通过出售其亚斯生活项目三座规划建筑中的房产，获得了 13 亿迪拉姆（3.54 亿美元）的收入。【原文：Aldar Properties PJSC, Abu Dhabi’s largest property developer, generated 1.3 billion dirhams ($354 million) from selling properties in three planned buildings at its Yas Living project, aided by demand from foreign buyers.】

item.title: 英镑逼近两个月低点，交易员增加英国央行鸽派押注
item.description: 在英国就业数据促使交易商加大对英国央行降息的押注后，英镑回落。【原文：The pound retreated after UK jobs data prompted traders to add to wagers on Bank of England interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 中美关税担忧再起，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 由于中国威胁对美国遏制其航运业采取进一步报复措施，欧洲股市下跌。爱立信公司（Ericsson AB）飙升，因为这家瑞典电信设备制造商公布了强劲的盈利报告。【原文：European stocks fell as China has threatened further retaliatory measures against US curbs on its shipping sector. Ericsson AB soared after the Swedish telecom equipment maker reported robust earnings.】

item.title: 三星计划在重大薪酬改革中将奖金与股价挂钩
item.description: 三星电子公司首次根据股票价格向普通员工发放股票和奖金，这是为振兴韩国最大公司而进行的薪酬改革的最新一步。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is awarding shares and bonuses based on stock price to rank-and-file employees for the first time, the latest step in a compensation overhaul aimed at rejuvenating South Korea’s largest company.】

item.title: 马达加斯加总统躲藏起来，声称有人阴谋夺取他的生命
item.description: 马达加斯加总统因担心自己的生命安全而在数周的反政府示威后躲藏起来，他是最近一位面对青年领导的抗议者要求变革的统治者。【原文：Madagascar’s president is in hiding out of fear for his life following weeks of anti-government demonstrations, the latest ruler to face youth-led protesters demanding change.】

item.title: SEB 因涉嫌 EQT 股票销售内幕交易而被调查
item.description: 瑞典金融监管机构和公共检察官分别对贷款机构 SEB AB 进行了内幕交易调查，原因是该公司处理了 EQT AB 股票的大宗销售，即大宗交易。【原文：Sweden’s financial watchdog and public prosecutors have separately opened insider-trading investigations into lender SEB AB over its handling of major sales in EQT AB shares, known as block trades.】

item.title: 摩根大通称，如果没有风能和太阳能，美国有可能无法实现能源目标
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The US will struggle to generate the energy it needs to power growth in its tech industry without including wind and solar, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s global head of sustainable solutions.】

item.title: 华为的电动汽车合作伙伴 Seres 被指正就 20 亿美元的上市计划进行意向评估
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国电动汽车制造商赛轮集团股份有限公司（Seres Group Co.【原文：Chinese electric-vehicle maker Seres Group Co. has started gauging investor interest for a Hong Kong listing that may raise $1.5 billion to $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国就业市场放缓在预算案公布前出现缓解迹象
item.description: 周二公布的数据显示，英国劳动力市场出现进一步企稳迹象，雇主们似乎已经度过了因260亿英镑（约合347亿美元）工资税上调而引发的最严重震荡。【原文：The UK labor market showed further signs of stabilization in data released on Tuesday, with employers appearing to be past the worst of the shake-out triggered by a £26 billion ($34.7 billion) payroll tax increase.】

item.title: 英国石油公司石油交易疲软，产量持续反弹
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）称，石油贸易表现疲软打击了公司的利润，而产量则连续第二个季度增长。【原文：BP Plc said a weak oil trading performance hit the company’s profit while production increased for a second straight quarter.】

item.title: Metaplanet 的企业价值跌破比特币持有量
item.description: Metaplanet 公司的企业价值跌破了其比特币储备的价值，凸显出全球投资者对所谓的数字资产财务公司的胃口越来越小。【原文：Metaplanet Inc.’s enterprise value dipped below that of its Bitcoin reserves, underscoring diminishing investor appetite for so-called digital-asset treasury firms globally.】

item.title: 加密货币持续低迷，中国反击美国
item.description: 加密货币在经历了历史性的一轮清算后继续下跌，引发了周末的大幅抛售。【原文：Cryptocurrencies continued to lose ground after a historic round of liquidations that triggered a sharp selloff over the weekend.】

item.title: 萨瓦德尔称绝大多数客户拒绝 BBVA 收购
item.description: 萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）的绝大多数客户同时也是股东，他们拒绝了 BBVA SA 190 亿美元的收购要约，这可能会让人怀疑该要约是否超过了 50%的门槛。【原文：The overwhelming majority of Banco Sabadell SA’s clients who are also shareholders spurned BBVA SA’s $19 billion takeover bid, potentially raising doubt that it crossed the 50% threshold.】

item.title: 埃及希望将液化天然气出口量提高到三月以吸引投资者
item.description: 埃及的目标是在未来五个月内增加液化天然气出口，这对于一个最近为避免国内供应紧张而成为液化天然气净进口国的国家来说，是一个重大转变。【原文：Egypt is aiming to increase its liquefied natural gas exports over the next five months, a stark turnaround for a country that recently become a net importer of the fuel to stave off a supply crunch at home.】

item.title: 菲律宾财政部长警告贪污丑闻将拖累经济发展
item.description: 菲律宾财政部长拉尔夫-雷克托（Ralph Recto）警告说，政府在基础设施项目上的反腐行动可能会使这个东南亚国家的经济增长放缓，直至明年年初。【原文：Philippine Finance Secretary Ralph Recto warned that the government’s anti-corruption drive on infrastructure projects could slow the Southeast Asian country’s economic growth until early next year.】

item.title: 广告和人工智能需求强劲，阳狮集团上调业绩增长预期
item.description: 受益于客户对人工智能广告的强劲需求，阳狮集团（Publicis Groupe SA）今年第二次上调了业绩增长预期。【原文：Publicis Groupe SA raised its forecast for growth for the second time this year, benefiting from strong customer demand for artificial intelligence-led advertising.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国就业数据公布前英镑上涨
特朗普港口收费令中国船舶运营商更加头疼
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统征收美国港口费所带来的额外成本，给已经在应对贸易战升级和运费下降的中国集装箱航运公司带来了更大的痛苦。【原文：Extra costs from President Donald Trump’s US port fees spell further pain for Chinese container shipping companies, which are already dealing with an escalating trade war and lower freight rates.】

item.title: 英国缺乏用于量子、人工智能等关键领域的增长资金
item.description: 据一份报告称，英国在人工智能、量子计算和生命科学等关键领域的衍生企业难以筹集到资金在英国扩大规模，只能搬迁或出售给美国公司发展。【原文：UK spinouts in critical sectors such as artificial intelligence, quantum computing and life sciences struggle to raise funding to scale up in the UK, relocating or selling to US companies to grow, according to a report.】

item.title: 小麦创五年新低，供应前景改善，贸易摩擦加剧
item.description: 小麦连续第四天下跌，并创下自 2020 年以来的最低收盘价，原因是供应前景改善以及中美贸易关系再度紧张。【原文：Wheat fell for a fourth day and headed for its lowest close since 2020 on an improved supply outlook and renewed US-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 欧洲力争人工智能独立 避免沦为科技 "殖民地
item.description: 今年 6 月，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）在爱丽舍宫（Élysée Palace）与一位特殊的客人举行了一场别开生面的晚宴：他是英伟达公司的黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）。黄仁勋与法国领先的人工智能初创公司 Mistral 刚刚签署了一项协议，共同开发法国最大的数据中心。【原文：In June, French president Emmanuel Macron held an exclusive dinner at the Élysée Palace with a special guest: Nvidia’s Jensen Huang. Wine glasses clinked in honor of a deal his company had just unveiled with Mistral, the leading French artificial intelligence startup, to develop France’s largest data centers.】

item.title: 消费者还能忍受关税多久？
item.description:
市场正在从特朗普的关税冲击中反弹。消费者的动态则有所不同。【原文：

Markets are rebounding from Trump’s tariffs shock. The dynamic is different for consumers.

】

item.title: 苏富比拍卖行老板称巨富计划重返伦敦
item.description: 苏富比国际地产公司（Sotheby's International Realty）英国房地产代理公司的老板乔治-阿扎尔（George Azar）表示，因更严厉的财富税而离开伦敦的超级富豪们正在保留他们的房产，以期在政策环境改变后重返伦敦。【原文：Ultra-rich individuals leaving London due to tougher wealth taxes are keeping their homes with the view of returning once the policy environment changes, according to George Azar, the boss of Sotheby’s International Realty’s UK property agency.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）在遭遇 Cboe 挑战后吹捧更快上市和指数发行
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX Ltd. ）旨在通过加快首次公开募股和扩大指数资格来鼓励更多公司上市，因为澳大利亚的主要交易所运营商正在与 Cboe Global Markets Inc.【原文：ASX Ltd. aims to encourage more listings by speeding up initial public offerings and broadening index eligibility, as Australia’s main exchange operator contends with competition from Cboe Global Markets Inc.】

item.title: 铁矿石从八个月高位回落，对中国港口的担忧减弱
item.description: 铁矿石从 2 月底以来的最高点回落，原因是对中国新港口费可能带来的供应问题的担忧有所缓解。【原文：Iron ore fell from the highest since late February as some concerns over potential supply issues from new port fees in China eased.】

item.title: 更多经济学家认为 10 月份韩国央行将因房市风险而按兵不动
item.description: 更多的经济学家现在预计韩国央行本月将维持利率不变，理由是随着首尔房价反弹，金融稳定风险不断增加，尽管大多数董事会成员已表示对降息持开放态度，但韩国央行仍将推迟进一步降低借贷成本。【原文：More economists now expect the Bank of Korea to hold rates this month, citing growing financial stability risks as Seoul housing prices rebound, delaying a further lowering of borrowing costs despite most board members having signaled an openness to a cut.】

item.title: 蒂姆-库克到访引发关注，Pop Mart 股价上涨
item.description: 在苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）参观了拉布布展览，重新点燃了投资者对这家中国玩具制造商的热情。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. shares climbed the most in nearly two months after Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook’s visit to a Labubu exhibition rekindled investor enthusiasm over the Chinese toymaker.】

item.title: 中美就遏制措施发生冲突后，中国保持通信线路畅通
item.description: 中国驳斥了美国关于中国没有回应其最新稀土出口限制询问的抱怨，称尽管最近局势紧张，但中国政府一直在就贸易问题保持沟通。【原文：China dismissed complaints from the US that it didn’t respond to inquiries over its latest export curbs on rare earths, saying Beijing has been maintaining communications over trade issues despite recent tensions.】
